main event: An unidentified object was tracked on ground-radar in Grosse Pointe, Michigan, for 15 minutes before it suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The object was tracked for 15 minutes on ground-radar,The radar return was exceptionally strong for a typical weather balloon,The object disappeared suddenly without any physical evidence,No photos were taken of the object,Another sighting described a similar white round light that hovered in the sky.
sighted object: an unidentified object tracked on radar
